page.title: 02PEOPLE IN OUR AREA
page.content: The{farmer,}Mr Wilkinson lives on Mains House Farm.In the morning at 7:45am Mr Wilkinson wakes up the family and has breakfast.He milks the cows and after milking he washes the utensils.This takes from 11:00am to 12:00pm.Then he has lunch.He works with the men till 5:00pm on the farm.Then he usually plays cricket as he is the captain of a local team.He gets back at 9:00pm and milks the cows.He goes to bed at midnight.In Spring he goes round to check the sheep at 2:30am.He thinks this area is agrand place to live in.His wife shopsin Barnard Castle and Darlington.He doesn't have time to go on holiday or even go to church.For entertainment he watches television.He owns a car.He thinks his children have a good future ahead of them.
